title: Toxic Beauty - Everything You Need to Know (with Alec Batis)
description:
Jillian has an epiphany about being your best self no matter what life throws at you; the enormous benefits of resistance and weight training; and research chemist and marketer Alec Batis joins us to talk about what’s in our beauty products and how they affect our overall health.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
